ComicInfo.Series: Brian Pulido's Lady Death: Infernal Sins
ComicInfo.Summary:
Lady Death celebrates 15 years in print this year, and the party kicks-off right here. This special issue features special art, previews and behind-the-scenes scoops on two of this year's biggest series! If you dare, learn about Lady Death: Blacklands, the next four-issue arc in Lady Death's saga featuring Wargoth, Satasha and the epic villainy of Sagos. This series also launches a new Lady Death villainess, Stygmata.
Also, get an intimate look at Lady Death: Sacrilege featuring returning Lady Death villainess Nocture and meet her sister Sacrilege! Being dead never looked so good.
